channel.title: Milestone 11 Requirements :: K-State CIS 400 Textbook
channel.description: Web Only This textbook was authored for the CIS 400 - Object-Oriented Design, Implementation, and Testing course at Kansas State University. This section describes assignments specific to the Spring 2023 offering of that course. Prior semester offerings can be found here. If you are not enrolled in the course, please disregard this section. Assignment requirements: Deploy your website to Azure Web Services Purpose: To practice deploying original web applications to Azure Web Services
